title: All 32 - Las Vegas Raiders: Embracing a new town and plenty of new faces with Vic Tafur (Football 6/27)
description:
Well, we made it. The last installment of 'All 32'. And we didn't skip any teams! The Raiders are headed to a new city, will they bring new fortune with them? Vic Tafur of The Athletic joins John Breech to analyze Las Vegas. Vic first chats about the move and mood of the fanbase (2:15), before discussing the Tom Brady sweepstakes (5:00) and addition of Marcus Mariota as Derek Carr's backup (7:45). The Raiders made a ton of moves in free agency and the draft so we give focus to Henry Ruggs (8:45), Cory Littleton (10:30) and more. What's the ceiling and floor for this team (15:45)? Listen to the finale of 'All 32' to find out!
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @johnbreech, @VicTafur
Subscribe to our Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7ZUfHFsuQcW7BkTHnXJtqw
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
